name: Round Coffee Table

It comes with a snapdragon processor with a 5n chip in it. It has a 200mp camera in the rear 100mp in front perfect for selfie lovers. It also support HDR content means you can watch 4K content on it.

name: SMUG Standing Desk
description: 【Ergonomic Healthy Style】The ergonomic electric standing desk allows you to release your hands and effortlessly customize the desired height between 28.7''- 48''. With a high-quality motor, our adjustable desk operates quietly at less than 55dB and can be used with confidence even in the quietest room.
description2: 【Precise & Stable Adjustment】Designed to cater to your needs, our stand up desk design features an LED display and 3 memory presets, helping you make precise and quick adjustments. The robust wooden desktop and the T-shaped steel frame ensure maximum stability and can hold up to 176 lbs.
